mapper.select:
select id from zmn_census_room_address t1
AND t1.deleted =0
and t1.id= #{roomAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t1.area LIKE concat('%',#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.town LIKE concat('%',#{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.village LIKE concat('%',#{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.community LIKE concat('%',#{community,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.build_num LIKE concat('%',#{buildNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.unit_num LIKE concat('%',#{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.floor_num LIKE concat('%',#{floorNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.room_num LIKE concat('%',#{roomNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.examine_person_name LIKE concat('%',#{examinePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t1.charge_person_id= #{chargePersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND created_date > #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and created_date < #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by created_date desc
select * from zmn_census_room_address t1 where t1.deleted=0 and t1.id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zmn_census_community where deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zmn_census_room_address where deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zmn_census_person_info where deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zmn_census_room_address WHERE deleted =0 AND TO_DAYS(created_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW())-1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zmn_census_room_address WHERE deleted =0 AND TO_DAYS(created_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW())

select charge_person_name as chargePersonName, area as area,community,count(*) as realHoldCount, sum(person_count) as realPersonCount from zmn_census_room_address as t1
AND t1.deleted =0
and t1.id= #{roomAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t1.area LIKE concat('%',#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.town LIKE concat('%',#{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.village LIKE concat('%',#{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.community LIKE concat('%',#{community,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.build_num LIKE concat('%',#{buildNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.unit_num LIKE concat('%',#{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.floor_num LIKE concat('%',#{floorNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.room_num LIKE concat('%',#{roomNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND t1.examine_person_name LIKE concat('%',#{examinePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t1.charge_person_id= #{chargePersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t1.created_date > #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.created_date < #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by t1.community order by t1.community

select zcra.id as roomAddressId, zcra.area as area,zcra.community as community, zcra.build_num as buildNum,zcra.unit_num as unitNum,zcra.floor_num as floorNum,zcra.room_num as roomNum, zcra.created_date as createdDate, zcra.fill_person_phone as fillPersonPhone, zchh.h2_live as h2Live,zchh.h2_no_live as h2NoLive, zchh.h3_man as h3Man, zchh.h3_woman as h3Woman, zchh.h4_man as h4Man, zchh.h4_woman as h4Woman, zcpi.d1 as d1, zcpi.d2 as d2,zcpi.d7 as d7, zcpi.d8 as d8 from zmn_census_room_address zcra left join zmn_census_house_hold zchh on zcra.id = zchh.room_address_id left join zmn_census_person_info zcpi on zcra.id = zcpi.room_address_id
AND zcra.deleted = 0 and zcra.deleted = 0 and zcpi.deleted = 0
and t1.id= #{roomAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t1.area LIKE concat('%',#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.town LIKE concat('%',#{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.village LIKE concat('%',#{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.community LIKE concat('%',#{community,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.build_num LIKE concat('%',#{buildNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.unit_num LIKE concat('%',#{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.floor_num LIKE concat('%',#{floorNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.room_num LIKE concat('%',#{roomNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.examine_person_name LIKE concat('%',#{examinePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and zcra.charge_person_id= #{chargePersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND zcra.created_date > #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and zcra.created_date < #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select zcra.id as roomAddressId,zcra.*,zchh.*,zcpi.*, CONVERT(zcra.build_num,SIGNED) as buildNumInt, CONVERT(zcra.unit_num,SIGNED) as unitNumInt, CONVERT(zcra.floor_num,SIGNED) as floorNumInt, CONVERT(zcra.room_num,SIGNED) as roomNumInt from zmn_census_room_address zcra left join zmn_census_house_hold zchh on zcra.id = zchh.room_address_id left join zmn_census_person_info zcpi on zcra.id = zcpi.room_address_id
AND zcra.deleted = 0 and zcra.deleted = 0 and zcpi.deleted = 0
and t1.id= #{roomAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t1.area LIKE concat('%',#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.town LIKE concat('%',#{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.village LIKE concat('%',#{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.community LIKE concat('%',#{community,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.build_num LIKE concat('%',#{buildNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.unit_num LIKE concat('%',#{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.floor_num LIKE concat('%',#{floorNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.room_num LIKE concat('%',#{roomNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND zcra.examine_person_name LIKE concat('%',#{examinePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and zcra.charge_person_id= #{chargePersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND zcra.created_date > #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and zcra.created_date < #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by zcra.community,buildNumInt,unitNumInt,floorNumInt,roomNumInt,roomAddressId
